metadata.description:
Building blocks for Near Social applications.
- Search for common components by name or tag. Initially filtered by `dev` tag.
- Look for curated components grouped by category.

Props:
`commonComponentTag` - to filter by a given tag
`curatedComps` - curated list of components grouped by category. 
: curatedComps properties: 
`category`: Category name
`components`: list of components. Component properties: `accountId` , `widgetName`
metadata.name: Common Components Library
